name: LOUP
description:
A fun, kid-friendly game of tag with a twist!

The closer you get to the Wolf, the more points you earn, but take care not to get too close...

Plays with a keyboard or a gamepad (controls are customisable).

The original version of this game was made in 48 hours for the 33rd Ludum Dare.
This version adds music, sounds effects, more animations, an additional character and a few UI tweaks.

v.1.1 changelog:
- French translation

A game by 01101101 with music from Mathieu Hallouin.
